dc:title: On Pilgrimage - May 1960
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes a speaking trip to Vancouver, Oregon, and San Francisco. Admires the varied apostolic works of the people she visits as examples of service to the common good.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 764 1960-05-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
